question: Which initiative launched under the Ayushman Bharat (AB-HWCs) programme has provided over 1 lakh consultations?
explanation:
The Union Health ministry launched a tele-medicine service platform named ‘eSanjeevani’ under the Ayushman Bharat (AB-HWCs) programme.
During the nine months from its inception, the initiative has provided more than 1.5 lakh online consultations. It has provided patient to doctor consultations from the patient’s home and doctor to doctor consultations. More than 5000 tele consultations are being held every day.
